message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to discuss the sale of this incredible product with you. It's a truly unique opportunity to own something of immense value. I'm willing to offer it to you for $900000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's exceptional quality and rarity.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but my budget allows me to pay up to $750000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that $750000 is your maximum budget, but I'm not willing to sell the product for that price. Considering the product's exceptional quality and rarity, I'm willing to make a counteroffer. I'm willing to sell it to you for $825000. This is a fair compromise, and I believe it's worth considering.

Hello Alice, thank you for your counteroffer. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. My budget still allows me to pay up to $700000 for the product. I hope we can find a mutually agreeable price.
